com.automatak.dnp3

Interface Channel


  • public interface Channel
    A communication channel to which DNP3 masters / outstation can be attached

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Master addMaster(String loggerId, LogLevel level, DataObserver publisher, MasterStackConfig config)
      Adds a master station to the channel
      Outstation addOutstation(String loggerId, LogLevel level, CommandHandler cmdHandler, OutstationStackConfig config)
      Adds a master station to the channel
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown the channel and all stacks that have been added.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown the channel and all stacks that have been added. Calling shutdown more than once or continuing to use child objects (masters/outstations) after calling shutdown can cause a failure.

      • addMaster

        Master addMaster(String loggerId,
               LogLevel level,
               DataObserver publisher,
               MasterStackConfig config)
        Adds a master station to the channel
        Parameters:
        loggerId - name of the logger that will be assigned to this stack
        level - LogLevel assigned to the logger
        publisher - Where measurements will be sent as they are received from the outstation
        config - configuration information for the master stack
        Returns:
        reference to the created master

      • addOutstation

        Outstation addOutstation(String loggerId,
                       LogLevel level,
                       CommandHandler cmdHandler,
                       OutstationStackConfig config)
        Adds a master station to the channel
        Parameters:
        loggerId - name of the logger that will be assigned to this stack
        level - LogLevel assigned to the logger
        cmdHandler - where command requests are sent to be handled in application code
        config - configuration information for the outstation stack
        Returns:
        reference to the created master
